metadata.title: Product Manager Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for Product Manager positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with 6 years of experience in defining product strategy and managing development. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
achievements: Led a cross-functional team of 10+ engineers and designers in developing a cloud-based analytics platform, resulting in a 25% increase in user engagement.
Defined product vision and roadmap, aligning with company objectives, leading to a 40% increase in market reach within the first year.
Implemented data-driven decision-making processes, which reduced feature development time by 15%.

experience.title: Product Manager
achievements: Managed the launch of a mobile application that ranked top 10 in the App Store within two months of release.
Worked closely with UX/UI teams to redesign user interfaces, increasing user satisfaction scores by 30%.
Streamlined product development cycles through the introduction of Agile methodologies, improving efficiency by 20%.

experience.title: Junior Product Manager
achievements: Assisted in the creation and prioritization of a product backlog, facilitating a smooth transition from legacy systems.
Collaborated with sales and marketing teams to define go-to-market strategies, which increased product adoption by 15%.
Conducted market analysis and user research to support product innovation and feature enhancements.

projects.name: AI-Powered Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Developed an AI-driven engine that recommends personalized content to users, increasing engagement by 50%.
